title: Circles II
creator_credit: Doris Chase, King Screen Productions and Perspective Films
brief_description: Members of the Mary Stanton Dance Ensemble perform in and around huge fibreglass circles designed by artist/filmmaker Doris Chase. A superimposition technique is used on the circles and human forms, which rotate in a of different patterns and colors. The dancers move with, around and through the kinetic sculptures. Music by George Kleinsinger. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
